string.text: {=PERPstr1}This is a Persistent Empires Roleplay server. Please ensure you are familiar with the rules before playing (press F1 when spawned). Loading may take a while the first time you join.
{=PERPstr2}This is a Persistent Empires Roleplay server. Please ensure you are familiar with the rules before playing (press F1 when spawned). Loading may take a while the first time you join.
{=PERPstr3}This is a Persistent Empires Roleplay server. Please ensure you are familiar with the rules before playing (press F1 when spawned). Loading may take a while the first time you join.
{=PEstr1}Jump straight into the drama in this so called Roleplay mod and get RDMed. The Loading screen may take a while the first time you join.
{=PEstr2}Jump straight into the drama in this so called Roleplay mod and get RDMed. The Loading screen may take a while the first time you join.
{=PEstr3}Jump straight into the drama in this so called Roleplay mod and get RDMed. The Loading screen may take a while the first time you join.
